templates.template: CREATE TABLE `report_data_@ID@_banner` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `report_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `group_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `period` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `part_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_1` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_2` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_3` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_4` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_5` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `mea_1` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_2` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_3` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_4` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_5` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_6` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_7` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_8` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_9` double DEFAULT NULL, `load_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `updated_at` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `app_ids` (`report_id`,`group_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=382 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `report_data_@ID@_banner` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `report_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `group_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `period` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `part_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_1` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_2` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_3` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_4` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `memo_5` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `mea_1` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_2` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_3` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_4` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_5` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_6` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_7` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_8` double DEFAULT NULL, `mea_9` double DEFAULT NULL, `load_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `updated_at` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `app_ids` (`report_id`,`group_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=382 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
